analysis.key_quote: Americans who dedicate their lives to careers in civil service deserve to go to work feeling secure that they will have the same job in four years under a new administration, not live in anxiety that a new president with a different political ideology will fire them and replace them with lackeys and stooges.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of job security for civil servants and the risks of politicization, which aligns with concerns about due process and merit-based systems.
